page.title: 07COMMUNICATIONS-PO-BT-BUS-AIR
page.content: {POST OFFICE-}2 IN AREA, LEIGH AND STROOD GREEN . FULL SERVICE . PO RUNS BUS SERVICE FROM LEIGH TO REIGATE (RETURN) ASSISTING COUTRY MOBILITY. 2 COLLECTIONS,2 DELIVERIES DAILY. A FEW POST BOXES BY ROADSIDE. {BRITISH TELECOMM-}WAS THE GENERAL POST OFFICE UNTIL POST AND TELECOMM WERE SPLIT UP IN 1985. ESTIMATED THAT 95% OF POPULATION IS CONNECTED TO THE INTERNATIONAL SUBSCRIBER TRUNK DIALLING SYSTEM. MANY SHAREHOLDERS. ALL TELECOMMS FACILITIES OFFERED BY BT.2 PUBLIC TELEPHONE BOXES(KIOSKS) AND SOME PAY PHONES IN PUBLIC PLACES. {BUS-}COUNTRY BUSES RUN FROM LEIGH TO DORKING,(SOME SAY IRREGULARLY!) {AIR-}LONDON-GATWICK AND HEATHROW- NATIONAL AND INTERNATIONAL AIRPORTS ARE UNDER 30mins AWAY. HELECOPTER LINK BETWEEN AIRPORTS FLIES OVER BURYS COURT AT REGULAR INTERVALS, IT WOULD!
